cards.text: Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Arid Mesa: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.name: Bloodstained Mire
cards.text: Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Bloodstained Mire: Search your library for a wamp or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then suffle your library. Where dragons once triumphed, their bones now molder.
